Hey everyone,

It's been almost a decade since I played the game, but I remember that I had downloaded it from some place on AOL. It was a game where each question was a riddle, and to advance, you had to get the answer exactly right, or else you'd die. I'm not sure if anyone's aware of this.

One of the riddles in it was:
Turn us on our backs
    And open up our stomachs
    You will be the wisest of men
    Though at start a lummox.

That's about all I can remember. Does anyone have this one, or know where I can get it? I've searched for a long time for it.

Thanks,
lakerguy_ca
